class.name: Phaser.GamepadButton

parameters.name: pad
parameters.help: A reference to the gamepad that owns this button.

parameters.name: buttonCode
parameters.help: The button code this GamepadButton is responsible for.

class.help: If you need more fine-grained control over the handling of specific buttons you can create and use Phaser.GamepadButton objects.

public.name: destroy
public.help: Destroys this GamepadButton, this disposes of the onDown, onUp and onFloat signals and clears the pad and game references.

public.name: justPressed

returns.help: True if the button is just pressed otherwise false.

public.help: Returns the "just released" state of this button. Just released is considered as being true if the button was released within the duration given (default 250ms).

parameters.name: duration
parameters.help: The duration below which the button is considered as being just released.

public.name: reset
public.help: Resets this GamepadButton, changing it to an isUp state and resetting the duration and repeats counters.

public.name: duration
public.help: If the button is down this value holds the duration of that button press and is constantly updated.\nIf the button is up it holds the duration of the previous down session.
public.inlineHelp: The number of milliseconds this button has been held down for.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running game.

public.name: onDown
public.inlineHelp: This Signal is dispatched every time this GamepadButton is pressed down. It is only dispatched once (until the button is released again).

public.name: onFloat
public.inlineHelp: This Signal is dispatched every time this GamepadButton changes floating value (between (but not exactly) 0 and 1)

public.name: onUp
public.inlineHelp: This Signal is dispatched every time this GamepadButton is pressed down. It is only dispatched once (until the button is released again).

public.name: pad
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the gamepad that owns this button.

public.name: repeats
public.inlineHelp: If a button is held down this holds down the number of times the button has 'repeated'.

public.name: timeDown
public.inlineHelp: The timestamp when the button was last pressed down.

public.name: timeUp
public.inlineHelp: The timestamp when the button was last released.

public.name: value
public.inlineHelp: Button value. Mainly useful for checking analog buttons (like shoulder triggers)
